text.para: It is possible to checkout the source code for Netxx using an anonymous cvs account. First, login using the anonymous username.
Although you will be prompted for a password, this anonymous account does not have one. You should just press enter. Then you can checkout Netxx.

Since all development is done on a branch, you might want to use the cvs web interface to find the branch you want to checkout. For example, to checkout branch BRN-0_3_1 you would use the following command.
